title: The final nail in the coffin for Mordekaiser...

replies.body: The dragon ghost is pretty ridiculous though. You can take any turret you want, and even use it to baron with your jungler.
The issue with that is that when your team is behind and can't get dragons, a HUGE part of Mordekaiser's kit becomes irrelevant.

His creeping death heals him and his lane partner for a percentage of the damage it dealt now.

Also it seems to have a massively increased movement speed bonus.

> [{quoted}](name=Sorgklaan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=lYpz0Efx,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-08-04T23:08:38.102+0000)
>
> His creeping death heals him and his lane partner for a percentage of the damage it dealt now.
> 
> Also it seems to have a massively increased movement speed bonus.

Plus, his attack range and attack animation have been improved. And W has no health cost anymore.

I loved morde and this is a huge nerf in cased in a " you get movement moving towards ally and a heal! plus a cool dragon" your heal wont do shit moving towards eachother wont do shit especially if you are trying to chase an enemy ( arent running towards eachother= no movementspeed) need to be standing ontop of eachother for the damage+ heal=LOL. lets change a complete bruiser into some complete uselessness but hide it under some fancy wording so people stupid enough will believe its good. this change is complete garbage and needs to be scrapped right away. if this goes live im done.

if theres one thing i've learned over the years, its riot does as riot pleases. they've always stated for doing certain things "well its our focus too... or our objective was too...  we felt like he just was..."

and they never ever state what it is they want a champion to be able to do, or accomplish, or label their strengths and weaknesses of what they're good at or whats good against them, if they did that they would be labeling %$^* tier.

they always end with, "we feel like its a step in the right direction to becoming healthy"

You really, REALLY cannot make any judgments over the effectiveness or the rights and wrongs of Mordekaiser's new uh... ideals until he comes out. Until then. well. Probably shouldn't say a damn thing, less you looking like a fool once he comes out.

Wait for it to come out before saying whether you like it? Who needs to test changes anywyas, why not just release something to live immediately if you're not going to test it. I have no idea how your comment is getting upvoted.
I'm not saying that I enjoy the changes, I'm just saying that you cannot really make a proper judgement before the rework actually comes out offically.

I am hardly claiming to be proving a full in-depth analysis of the changes. Most people oppose the idea of the changes. You are saying that no one has the RIGHT to question the changes until they've already been released. I don't think you know why Riot use isolated testing environments before they release anything to live servers. If it has been released officially, and the champion was horrible, then there would be overwhelming backlash. And for two weeks aswell. Riot would be pressured to release a great fix in the next patch, and they could not mess it up. There's a reason for testing environments, and the live servers are not anywhere to test these changes first.
